data.oai_dc:dc: This data file contains egg viability for D. melanogaster originating from a high and low altitude population at five latitudes (ten populations) collected in 2002. When using this data, please cite the original publication:Collinge, J. E., Hoffmann, A. A. and McKechnie, S. W. (2006). Altitudinal patterns for latitudinally varying traits and polymorphic markers in Drosophila melanogaster from eastern Australia. Journal of Evolutionary Biology 19: 473-482
